text: RT @EnvAgencyYNE: Despite a challenging year, barriers to fish migration are still being tackled. Slitting Mill weir has been removed as pa…

@SevernUnlocked @CanalRiverTrust @severnrivers @HeritageFundM_E @EnvAgencyMids @LIFEprogramme @fishmigration @CRTWalesandSW @CRTWestMidlands @DaveThroupEA @ChrisBaingerEA Travelled up The Severn on a narrow  boat between Worcester and Stourport a year ago. Great fun, but just made the locks in time!

The @EnvAgencyMids Boston #HavenBanks Improvement Scheme is getting winter ready. So far, progress on the project includes building up the core section of the banks with clay & adding new topsoil, & spreading grass seed for over 5km from the #BostonBarrier down to the Wash. https://t.co/tdpONgVgae
